explanation: The stage direction describes a sequence of events and noises over time, narrating the passing of hours and the sounds heard. This fits the definition of 'narration' which includes long stage directions with narrative quality intended for readers.
stgdir: Abois de chiens sur la route... Autos qui passent... Silence. Deux heures, bruits d'autos... Silence. Trois heures... Chants du coq se répandant dans la campagne... Silence. Quatre heures...
